entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
